"War Horse" tells the story of a young boy named Joseph who lives in rural Devon, England. When World War I breaks out, Joseph becomes involved in the local military efforts by volunteering to work at a nearby munitions factory.

As Joseph works at the munitions factory, he begins to develop feelings of love and protectiveness towards a group of horses that are being kept on the property for use as working animals in the munitions factory.
